channel.title: Political Violence on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Political Violence on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Charlie Kirk Shooting Suspect Charged as Prosecutor Seeks Death Penalty
item.description: In the indictment, prosecutors claim Tyler Robinson planned Kirk’s killing in advance, citing rooftop surveillance, engraved bullets, and a written note as they seek the death penalty.
